title: 3 Quick Ways to Save TikTok Videos Without a Watermark

steps.title: Navigate to a video.
steps.content: Navigate to a video. To download a TikTok video without a watermark, you'll need to Duet the video and save it before you post it. Make sure you have your camera and microphone settings enabled in your device's settings. [1] X Research source If the video doesn't allow Duets, you'll need to use a TikTok downloader instead.

steps.title: Tap the Share button.
steps.content: Tap the Share button. This is the arrow on the bottom-right side of the screen. A pop-up menu will open on the bottom.

steps.title: Tap Duet.
steps.content: Tap Duet . You can find this in the bottom row. You may need to scroll towards the right to see it. The Duet feature will load.

steps.title: Tap the icon of the person in a box.
steps.content: Tap the icon of the person in a box. This is the setting that will turn your background into a green screen.

steps.title: Cover your camera.
steps.content: Cover your camera. You can also point the camera upward while you record.

steps.title: Tap and hold the record button.
steps.content: Tap and hold the record button. You should only see the video as you record. Release the record button when the video finishes.

steps.title: Tap the red arrow.
steps.content: Tap the red arrow. This will exit recording mode.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . This is on the right of the app. If needed, tap the down-arrow to show more options. The video will be saved to your device. If needed, you can trim the video .

steps.title: You can only save your videos without a watermark during editing.
steps.content: You can only save your videos without a watermark during editing. If you already posted the TikTok, you'll have the watermark. When uploading a new video, tap the Save button on the right of the app to download your video without a watermark.

steps.title: Go to https://savett.cc/en1/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://savett.cc/en1/ in a web browser. You can use a desktop or mobile browser. Keep in mind this is a third-party service. Never enter your personal information or download unfamiliar apps.

steps.title: Paste the video link in the video.
steps.content: Paste the video link in the video. To get the link, navigate to a video and tap the Share button. Then, tap Copy link .

steps.title: Select Download.
steps.content: Select Download . This button should pop up after entering the link. The video will be downloaded to your device.
